name: Draconic France
startIntroPart1: Also known as Jeanne Alter (ジャンヌ・オルタ, Jan'nu Oruta?), she represents the Alter counterpart of Jeanne d'Arc.
startIntroPart2: However, being designated as an 'Alter' does not indicate a mere alternate aspect of Jeanne d'Arc. Instead, she represents the embodiment of vengeance attributed to Gilles de Rais, the French Army's marshal who grieved for Jeanne d'Arc's death, fabricated by means of the Holy Grail shortly after Jeanne's execution in 1431. As a Heroic Spirit and dark counterpart of the actual Jeanne, she was originally summoned by Gilles in the Ruler class, but can be later summoned by Chaldea in the Avenger class
declaringWar: Your sins have piled enough–allow me to burn them away.
attacked: Hah! So the righteous come crawling to their pyre.
defeated: Even flames die... but my hatred never will.
denounced: Spare me your sanctimony; your words reek of hypocrisy.
introduction: I am Jeanne d'Arc... or rather, what your god abandoned. Do you still dare speak His name before me?
neutralHello: You tread lightly, as if afraid I'll ignite you. Wise.
hateHello: Back again? Do you crave the flames that much?
tradeRequest: Hmph. Even i see value in mutual gain... for now.
uniqueText: Revenge upon the world is a must. Avenge yourself and burn the world with your Dragons.
